data.title: Famous Birthdays on May 8
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 8th of May. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on May 8.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 264

Joan I, Countess of Auvergne, queen of France (1350-60) (d. 1360)

Frederick I, Margrave of Brandenburg-Ansbach (1486-1536), born in Ansbach, Bavaria, Germany (d. 1536)

Andrea Alciato, Italian lawyer and writer, born in Alzate Brianza, Milan, Italy (d. 1550)

Saint Peter Canisius, Dutch Jesuit priest, born in Nijmegen, Habsburg Netherlands (d. 1597)

Johann Walter, German composer, born in Kahla, Electorate of Saxony, Holy Roman Empire (d. 1570)

Victor Amadeus I, Duke of Savoy (1630-37), born in Turin, Piedmont, Savoy (d. 1637)

Francis Quarles, English poet (Argalus & Parthenia, Emblems), born in Romford, Essex (d. 1644)
